base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Automated Tasks
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Automated Tasks

{% for item in data_sources.allFieldsAutomatedTask %} {% endfor %}
id created_by created_time modified_by modified_time agent_id policy_id custom_field_id assigned_check_id name collector_all_output enabled continue_on_error alert_severity email_alert text_alert dashboard_alert task_type win_task_name run_time_date expire_date daily_interval run_time_bit_weekdays weekly_interval run_time_minute monthly_days_of_month monthly_months_of_year monthly_weeks_of_month task_repetition_duration task_repetition_interval stop_task_at_duration_end random_task_delay remove_if_not_scheduled run_asap_after_missed task_instance_policy managed_by_policy
{{ item.id }} {{ item.created_by }} {{ item.created_time }} {{ item.modified_by }} {{ item.modified_time }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.policy_id }} {{ item.custom_field_id }} {{ item.assigned_check_id }} {{ item.name }} {{ item.collector_all_output }} {{ item.enabled }} {{ item.continue_on_error }} {{ item.alert_severity }} {{ item.email_alert }} {{ item.text_alert }} {{ item.dashboard_alert }} {{ item.task_type }} {{ item.win_task_name }} {{ item.run_time_date }} {{ item.expire_date }} {{ item.daily_interval }} {{ item.run_time_bit_weekdays }} {{ item.weekly_interval }} {{ item.run_time_minute }} {{ item.monthly_days_of_month }} {{ item.monthly_months_of_year }} {{ item.monthly_weeks_of_month }} {{ item.task_repetition_duration }} {{ item.task_repetition_interval }} {{ item.stop_task_at_duration_end }} {{ item.random_task_delay }} {{ item.remove_if_not_scheduled }} {{ item.run_asap_after_missed }} {{ item.task_instance_policy }} {{ item.managed_by_policy }}
